messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2126
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/24/2002 8:09:24 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Same here Sandra......... I was just speechless and didn t know what to say (thanks for
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/24/2002 8:09:24 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Dear Sandra-
> Just wanted to touch base with you - let you know that for you and for
> those who love Skye - you and they are in my thoughts. What a tragedy. I
> can not begin to express what was in my heart after reading your post. But
> wanted to let you know that I care. My care is with you, the kids, his
> family. Deborah
>

Same here Sandra.........

I was just speechless and didn't know what to say (thanks for saying what I
was thinking, but couldn't get it out Deborah)......It's just so much
happening to children in the world..........

Kim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
